channel.title: Proposal
channel.description:
Set up current worlds for download (like the older ones) Set up a whitelist for the current bukkit server (I've been pushing for this for a long time, why does FTB get it but not bukkit?) New world. If we're gonna have bukkit, the only real plugin we need is chest protection but with whitelist that won't be necessary (in most cases) Re-add my MoparCraft staff title since I'm apparently still a mod on the bukkit server :P
We're a community that likes working together but once we've built everything near the spawn, sometimes we just want to start fresh.
Oh and I'm back guys. Prepare for some awesome builds.
[size=72pt]PVP[/size]
Support list just in case: LilXCj kickingjamie asshole_rule NZ Shadow Relmitos Reyx7 drubrsakdlsaketern Travas noobs are ftw

item.title: Proposal
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:

Still no response from Tom?
[/quote]
It has been discussed on IRC and we do have a plan but I’m not going to say anything more until we’re 100% sure on when to expect some changes.[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Proposal
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:55, topic:523895”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=642439.msg4327220#msg4327220 date=1373140494]
I tend to avoid pvp because i’m really bad at it, so I probably wont be killing anybody, even though I find it fun.

But if it ends up like world 1, it’d have to be against it. I was being killed by Vain, and Tarkoff consantly (and i think agl, but i dont remember).
[/quote]I think we all ganged up on you just for the hell of it, just to piss you off.

Tom on the other hand, if you don’t have any friendly relations with him then watch out, Tom has always ruled over everyone in PvP, which made it a ton of fun.[/quote]

good to know…

Read full topic

item.title: Proposal
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

If I’m wandering around and I see some guy who is just choppin trees, I won’t kill him. But if you’re in your fort, I’m gonna make some awesome raid to break in and kill you. Typically just once. If you come back and kill me, I’ll come get you again. But random slaying of some noob? Pass.

Read full topic

item.title: Proposal
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:51, topic:523895”][quote author=Travas link=topic=642439.msg4327071#msg4327071 date=1373107969]

[quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=642439.msg4327069#msg4327069 date=1373107796]

[quote author=Travas link=topic=642439.msg4327062#msg4327062 date=1373106250]

As somebody that wants to build I’d rather not have to watch my back constantly.
[/quote]I can almost guarantee you will not have to watch your back constantly. With this close-knit community we have, everyone is generally friends so there’s not much to worry about.

I’m almost certain that there will be a few people that would turn up in full enchanted diamond armour, diamond swords, beast bows and just kill people trying to build for “teh lols”.
[/quote]I highly doubt it. We never had problems like that before when PvP was enabled throughout the entire server.

When I first started playing world 1 I remember being killed by Agl and Relmitos all the time while I was trying to build.
[/quote]Agl is the type of guy that will not kill you unless you do something to really piss him off, and I doubt you would do that kind of thing. As for Relmitos, I don’t know him well but iirc you and him are friends so it should be fine.

well jamies story is infact true but i do plan to do alot of building and therefore will follow my policy of not killing every second i mostly like pvp so i can kill people who piss me off[/quote]

aka bullying or reverse bullying depending on circumstances but it’s whatever, I just want everyone to play again

Read full topic
